VERIFICATION.NAME: Query
VERIFICATION.VALUE: SELECT soe.x_vf_customer_code CUSTOMER_CODE,sa2.SERIAL_NUM MSISDN from s_org_ext soe, s_org_ext_x soex, s_asset sa2, s_prod_int spi2, s_inv_prof sip, s_contact sc, s_party_per spp where sip.ACCNT_ID = soe.row_id and soe.row_id = soex.row_id and soe.row_id = spp.party_id and spp.person_id = sc.row_id and soe.x_vf_frs is null and UPPER(sc.FST_NAME) like '%ZZ' and UPPER(sc.LAST_NAME) like '%ZZ' and soe.cust_stat_cd = 'Active' and soe.ou_type_cd = 'Consumer' and soex.attrib_68 = 'Individual' and soex.attrib_69 = 'Consumer' and sip.payment_type_cd = 'Prepaid' and not exists (select 1 from s_order so where so.accnt_id = soe.row_id and ((so.status_cd = 'Open') or (so.status_cd = 'Pending'))) and spi2.name = 'Mobile phone service' and spi2.row_id = sa2.prod_id and sa2.owner_accnt_id = soe.row_id and sa2.serial_num is not null and sa2.status_cd = 'Active' and sip.row_id = sa2.bill_profile_id and exists (select 1 from s_asset sa, s_prod_int spi where spi.name = 'SIM package' and spi.row_id = sa.prod_id and sa.owner_accnt_id = soe.row_id and sip.row_id = sa.bill_profile_id) AND ( ( soe.url NOT LIKE '#B') OR ( soe.url IS NULL ) OR ( soe.url = 'Corrupt')) and sa2.created > sysdate-40 and rownum = 1 order by soe.created desc

VERIFICATION.NAME: Fail
VERIFICATION.VALUE: There are not clean source entities for this scenario
